question: Refer to the figure <image 1>, Which term refers to the follows the exposition where the conflict is introduced?
description: The image depicts a simple line graph with four points connected by lines. The first two points form an upward-sloping line, indicating an increase or rise. The third point is at the peak of the graph, forming a sharp angle with the previous line. The fourth point is connected to the third point with a downward-sloping line, indicating a decrease or fall. There is an orange arrow pointing downwards next to the second point, which suggests a transition from the rising part of the graph to the falling part.
